name: Standard
description: Baseline Soldier - Default "generalist" enemy with no strong strengths or weaknesses.

name: Ambusher
description: Stealth & Burst - Strikes from surprise, deals big damage in opening turns, fragile if exposed.

name: Artillery
description: Long-Range Cannon - Fragile backliner with extreme ranged threat; prefers cover and distance.

name: Bruiser
description: Frontline Brawler - Durable melee damage dealer, trades blows and pressures enemies up close.

name: Defender
description: Tank & Protector - Soaks damage, locks down foes, defends allies through positioning.

name: Horde
description: Overwhelming Numbers - Group of many individual creatures acting together as a single unit.

name: Controller
description: Battlefield Shaper - Disables, manipulates, or spawns minions to change flow of battle.

name: Ranged
description: Reliable Shooter - Balanced ranged attacker with consistent damage output.

name: Skirmisher
description: Mobile Harasser - Fast, evasive, focuses on hit-and-run tactics rather than raw damage.

name: Support
description: Ally Enhancer - Buffs, heals, or protects allies, rarely the primary damage source.
